mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS (member_name, member_useremail, member_password, member_phone, member_registration_date, member_birth_date, member_social_id, member_social_type) VALUES (#{member_name}, #{member_useremail}, #{member_password}, #{member_phone}, NOW(), #{member_birth_date}, #{member_social_id}, #{member_social_type})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBERS WHERE member_social_id = #{social_id} AND member_social_type = #{social_type}

select * from MEMBERS order by member_id desc
